message.body: hey john, fyi - someone called me and wanted to meet me, in order to complete ur background check. do u know wat they will ask? lol im meeting her today
I have no clue. Just be cool and answer whatever they ask. It'll just be random stuff about me.
lol ok is there anything i should know about u that i dnt know ? haha
You know everything you should know. Just answer to the best of your ability.
